* Government

Town Council
------------

The town council consists of a mayor and six council members. The council’s regular meeting is the first Tuesday of each month. Meetings are open to the public.

Looking for meeting agendas or meeting minutes? [Click Here](https://www.fairviewtexas.org/government/agendas-and-minutes.html)

### Search

![](https://www.fairviewtexas.org//images/John_Hubbard_retouched.png)

*John Hubbard*

* [mayor@fairviewtexas.org](mailto:mayor@fairviewtexas.org)
